ingredients.ingredient: 25 uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 teaspoon blackened seasoning, or to taste
1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 bunch fresh spinach, or to taste

cookingTips: Cook shrimp quickly over high heat to maintain tenderness
Add pineapple at the end to preserve its texture and bright acidity
Wilt spinach separately if preferred, or serve as a fresh bed under the shrimp
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide creation of a vibrant, tropical-flavored dish with sweet and savory balance. Help with proper seasoning and texture preservation.
